attributes.action: Give Grandparents automatic access rights to see their grandchildren.
attributes.additional_details: My son’s partner controls when, where and how we see our grandchild and as she has fallen out with us she will now not allow us to see or have any relationship with our grandchild. She has never allowed us to spend time alone with our grandchild, pick him up, take him out on walks, provide any child care for him even though they clearly struggle with money. Parents should not be allowed to use their child as a weapon against their grandparents.
attributes.background: To give Grandparents the automatic right to have access to their grandchildren so they can build and have loving and meaningful relationships with their grandchildren.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318156
